metadata.title: USN-7002-1 -- Setuptools vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that setuptools was vulnerable to remote code execution. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7002-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-pkg-resources - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm2 python-setuptools - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm2 python-setuptools-doc - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm2 python-setuptools-whl - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm2 python3-pkg-resources - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm2 python3-setuptools - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
